item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Leaks: Upcoming Flagship Smartphone Might Lack Telephoto Camera & Feature Rounded Corners - ABP Live
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Leaks: Upcoming Flagship Smartphone Might Lack Telephoto Camera & Feature Rounded Corners

Published at: 15 Dec 2024 08:06 PM (IST) | Source: ABP Live

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is reportedly undergoing design changes and may lack a traditional telephoto camera, causing speculation about its innovation in camera technology.

  • The S25 Ultra could feature a flatter design with rounded corners.
  • Leaks suggest the absence of a periscope telephoto lens, replacing it with ALoP (All Lenses on Prism) technology.
  • [There are rumors about a 50MP ultrawide sensor being introduced.]
  • Tech enthusiasts are eagerly awaiting the official unveiling of the Galaxy S25 series at a rumored event in January.
"The upcoming Galaxy S25 Ultra might adopt a flatter frame with softer, rounded corners, marking a departure from the sharper look of earlier models."

The leaks have generated considerable interest, but some skepticism remains regarding their authenticity.

item.title: Apple’s Siri gets smarter, iPhone 16 gets exclusive AI features in iOS 18.2 - India TV News
item.description:
Apple Enhances Siri and iPhone 16 with AI Features in iOS 18.2

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: India TV News

Apple has released the iOS 18.2 update, introducing advanced AI capabilities and exclusive features for iPhone 16 users, improving user experience significantly.

  • Introduction of the standalone Image Playground app for creating animated images using generative AI.
  • Launch of the Image Wand feature for converting sketches into refined images.
  • Expansion of writing tools, including the new Describe Your Change feature for text editing.
  • Exclusive feature Visual Intelligence for the iPhone 16 series for real-time object recognition and text translation.
  • ChatGPT integration makes Siri smarter, enabling complex query responses and photo analysis.
  • iOS 18.2 is available for all iPhones supporting iOS 18.
“Siri can now answer complex queries, explain documents, and analyze photos, taking personal assistance to the next level.”

The iOS 18.2 update marks another step forward in Apple’s commitment to enhancing user experience through innovative technologies.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air launch confirmed? Likely to replace iPhone 17 Plus - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air Launch Confirmed: What's New?

Publication Date: November 2024 | Source: India Today

The upcoming iPhone 17 Air is set to launch in 2025, expected to replace the iPhone 17 Plus model, as confirmed by supply chain reports.

  • iPhone 17 Air has entered the New Product Introduction phase at Foxconn.
  • The device is reported to be approximately 2mm slimmer than the current iPhone 16 Pro.
  • Expected display size ranges between 6.55 and 6.65 inches.
  • Will feature a custom-designed 5G modem chip optimized for battery life.
  • New rear camera design anticipated with a single 48MP lens.
  • Debut alongside iPhone 17 series, which includes Pro and Pro Max models.
“The NPI process involves design validation, prototype testing, supplier qualification, manufacturing development, and pilot production before full-scale manufacturing.”

The iPhone 17 Air promises exciting design changes and enhancements, marking a significant step in Apple’s smartphone evolution.

item.title: How to plan the perfect serve for a house party | Mint - Mint
item.description:
How to plan the perfect serve for a house party

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

In bartending lexicon, the perfect serve is the ultimate cocktail experience defined by various parameters such as ingredients, temperature, glassware, and technique.

  • The classic Old Fashioned serves best in a rocks glass at 7-10 degrees Celsius.
  • Chill the glass with ice water and use large ice cubes to minimize dilution.
  • Neil Alexander, a beverage consultant, emphasizes the importance of garnishes like fresh orange peel for enhancing flavor.
  • Proper technique is crucial: shake cocktails with juices, stir spirit-forward drinks, and pour gently for layered drinks.
“Knowing that you should shake, not stir cocktails which have juices or creams in them and vice versa for the spirit-forward drinks; pouring gently over the back of a spoon to maintain distinct layers.” - Neil Alexander

This article provides insights into how hobbyists can recreate the bar experience at home while emphasizing the importance of technique and presentation.

item.title: YouTube lets you watch videos in preferred languages: Here's how - NewsBytes
item.description:
YouTube lets you watch videos in preferred languages: Here's how

Published on: Not specified Source: NewsBytesApp

YouTube has introduced a new feature allowing users to watch select videos in their preferred languages, enhancing accessibility and user experience.

  • YouTube automatically defaults to users' preferred language but allows manual changes.
  • To change language on the web, access 'Settings' in the video player and select 'Audio track.'
  • For mobile, navigate to 'Settings' -> 'Additional settings' -> 'Audio.'
  • The feature enhances multilingual video search and personalized recommendations.
“The service is aimed at enhancing user experience by catering to their linguistic preferences.”

This new feature enhances accessibility and personalization on YouTube, making it easier for users to interact with content in their preferred languages.

item.title: Realme 14x 5G to launch with 6000mAh battery, under Rs 15000: Launching on December 18 - India TV News
item.description:
Realme 14x 5G to Launch with 6000mAh Battery, Under Rs 15000: Launching on December 18

Date: December 15, 2024 | Source: India TV News

Realme is preparing to launch its latest mid-range smartphone, the Realme 14x 5G, in India on December 18. This device is notable for its massive 6000mAh battery and an IP69 rating, targeting the budget smartphone segment.

  • The launch date is set for December 18.
  • The smartphone features a flat-frame design with a diamond-cut gradient back panel.
  • It will come in three RAM variants, with the highest being 8GB RAM and 256GB storage.
  • The display is a 6.67-inch HD+ IPS LCD, ideal for streaming and gaming.
  • The device has an IP69 rating, making it water and dust resistant.
  • Expected price is under Rs 15,000, potentially making it the world's cheapest IP69-rated smartphone.
"The upcoming smartphone claims to last longer while being used for multitasking, backed by a 6000 mAh battery."

The Realme 14x 5G is poised to make a significant impact in the budget smartphone market with its advanced features and affordability.

item.title: Up to 50 480p videos per month! All about Sora video generator - ET Now
item.description:
Up to 50 480p Videos Per Month: All About Sora Video Generator

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: etnownews.com

OpenAI has recently released its new AI video generator Sora, allowing users to create up to 50 low-resolution videos per month.

  • Sora is available for premium ChatGPT users.
  • Users can create films up to 1080p resolution and 20 seconds long.
  • Sora does not incur additional costs for Plus account users, emphasizing affordability.
  • The Pro plan offers ten times the usage, sharper resolutions, and longer durations.
  • Sora-generated movies include C2PA metadata to ensure transparency.
  • Currently, only a limited number of testers can use Sora for videos of humans.
"OpenAI said it is blocking content with nudity and preventing the most harmful uses, including child sexual abuse material and sexual deepfakes."

This release represents a significant advancement in AI-generated content, balancing accessibility and responsibility in content creation.

item.title: 5 amla recipes to boost immunity in winters - The Times of India
item.description:
5 Amla Recipes to Boost Immunity in Winters

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Amla or the Indian gooseberry is a powerhouse of vitamin C and antioxidants, ideal for boosting immunity during the winter months.

  • Amla Chutney: A tangy condiment made with green chilies, coriander, mint, garlic, and amla.
  • Amla Candy: Sweet and tangy treats made by coating amla with jaggery or sugar.
  • Amla Honey Shot: A drink made with fresh amla juice and honey to detoxify and boost immunity.
  • Amla Murabba: A sweet tonic made with amla cooked in sugar syrup, flavored with cardamom and saffron.
  • Amla Soup: A nutritious soup made with chopped amla, ginger, garlic, and spices.
Amla is rich in vitamin C, which strengthens white blood cells and enhances the body’s ability to fight infections.

Incorporating these five recipes into your winter diet can enhance immunity while adding flavor and health benefits.

item.title: Gadgets Weekly: Samsung Galaxy S24 Enterprise Edition and more - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Gadgets Weekly: Samsung Galaxy S24 Enterprise Edition and more

Published: 15 December 2024, Source: Deccan Herald

This week's Gadgets Weekly features new technology launches from various companies including Samsung, Epson, and Portronics, summarizing key products and innovations in consumer electronics.

  • Samsung Galaxy S24 Enterprise Edition: Offers Knox Suite for enhanced security and 7 years of firmware updates.
  • Epson CW-C8050: High-speed label printer suitable for businesses, capable of printing up to 3,000 labels per day.
  • Panasonic i-PRO AI Camera: Features AI-powered surveillance capabilities with options for high zoom and long-range performance.
  • Portronics Vayu 5.0: A cordless tyre inflator designed for ease of use with various inflation modes.
  • Blaupunkt BTW300 Moksha+: TWS earphones with Active Noise Cancellation and up to 50 hours of playtime.
“Generation Green embodies our commitment to the Government of India’s Net-Zero vision.” - Rakesh Bhardwaj, OPPO India

This article provides a comprehensive look at the latest in technology and how these products cater to both consumer and business needs.

item.description:
Apple’s AI Sparks Outrage Over False Alert About Luigi Mangione

Publication Date: October 2023 - Source: BBC

This article discusses the public backlash following a false alert generated by Apple’s AI, incorrectly reporting that Luigi Mangione had shot himself.

  • The false alert causes widespread concern and confusion.
  • This incident raises questions about the reliability of AI-generated information.
  • Public reactions include anger and disbelief regarding the misuse of technology.
“This incident highlights the critical importance of accuracy in AI systems.”

In conclusion, the incident underscores the potential dangers of relying on AI for news dissemination.

item.title: Black Myth Wukong Studio CEO Wrote Game of the Year Acceptance Speech Two Years Ago; Questions Selection Criteria of The Game Awards - MP1st
item.description:
Game of the Year Controversy: Black Myth Wukong Studio Expresses Discontent

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: MP1st

Game Science CEO Feng Ji expresses frustration over the selection criteria for Game of the Year at The Game Awards after their title, Black Myth Wukong, wins only two out of four nominations.

  • Feng Ji highlights the significance of their four nominations as a historic first for a Chinese game.
  • Despite the accolades, he questions the clarity of the selection criteria for Game of the Year.
  • Ji attributes the game’s success to Chinese culture, talent, and the ongoing growth of the domestic gaming industry.
“I wrote my Game of the Year acceptance speech two years ago—only to never get the chance to deliver it!”

The studio remains optimistic about the future, believing more high-quality Chinese games are on the horizon.

item.title: Most Affordable 5G Phones Under Rs 12000: Motorola, Samsung, Redmi, Lava, Poco, More - News9 LIVE
item.description:
Most Affordable 5G Phones Under Rs 12000: Motorola, Samsung, Redmi, Lava, Poco, More

Date: 2024 Source: News9 Live

In 2024, budget-conscious consumers can find several 5G smartphones priced under Rs 12,000 without compromising essential features. Here’s a look at some of the best options available.

Key Points

  • Moto G45 5G: Features a 50MP dual-camera, Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 chipset, and a 5000mAh battery. Price: Rs 10,999.
  • Redmi A4 5G: Starts at Rs 8,499 with a 50MP camera and 5,160mAh battery.
  • Lava Yuva 5G: Offers a versatile photography setup with a 50MP camera. Price: Rs 8,699.
  • Poco M6 Pro 5G: Slightly above budget at Rs 10,998, powered by Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 with strong specs.
  • Samsung Galaxy M15 5G: Priced at Rs 11,999 with a 6000mAh battery and a triple camera setup.

Notable Expert

Divya is a Senior Sub-Editor with 3 years in tech reporting and gadget reviews.

The availability of affordable 5G smartphones expands connectivity options for many users without the high price tag.

item.title: Google NotebookLM now lets you chat with AI podcast hosts, gets a new UI and subscription plan - The Indian Express
item.description:
Google NotebookLM now lets you chat with AI podcast hosts: Here’s how to use it

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Indian Express

Google’s AI-powered notebook web app, NotebookLM, is introducing a new feature allowing users to interact with AI podcast hosts in real-time.

  • The new feature lets users join AI-generated virtual podcasts through NotebookLM’s Audio Overview feature.
  • To use it, create a new Audio Overview, select the Interactive mode (BETA), and join the conversation with AI hosts.
  • NotebookLM is also implementing a new interface with panels named Sources, Chat, and Studio to streamline user experience.
  • A subscription plan called NotebookLM Plus has been introduced, offering additional features such as more Audio Overviews and customizable notebooks.

“AI hosts may pause awkwardly before responding and may occasionally introduce inaccuracies.”

Google emphasizes that this feature is experimental and is still being developed for better accuracy and performance.

item.title: Microsoft issues warning: 400 million Windows users urged not to update their PCs - Bizz Buzz
item.description:
Microsoft Issues Warning: 400 Million Windows Users Advised Against Updating PCs

Publication Date: Recent

Source: Various

Recently, Microsoft issued a critical warning to approximately 400 million Windows users, advising them against updating their PCs due to security concerns arising from the latest updates.

  • Warning issued during the final Patch Tuesday of 2024.
  • 71 vulnerabilities addressed, including a zero-day exploit.
  • Confusion over Windows 11 upgrade eligibility for PCs without TPM 2.0.
  • Microsoft initially enforced TPM 2.0 requirement but later reversed its stance.
  • Users encouraged to be cautious about updates to ensure system security.
“With Windows 10 end of support approaching, it’s important to revisit a key minimum system requirement for Windows 11: Trusted Platform Module (TPM) 2.0.”

This situation highlights the uncertainty within Microsoft's messaging regarding operating system upgrades and security. Users are urged to stay informed about updates and potential implications for their devices.

item.title: Why you should not give your phone charger to others? Hackers can steal data. Tips to stay safe - The Economic Times
item.description:
Why You Should Avoid Sharing Phone Chargers: Cybersecurity Risks Explained

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Panache Magazine

Charging your phone using someone else's charger may seem harmless, but it poses serious cybersecurity risks. Ethical hacker Ryan Montgomery warns that unknown charging cables can facilitate data theft.

Key Points:

  • Sharing chargers can expose you to cybersecurity threats.
  • Montgomery demonstrated how a simple charging cable can provide remote access to devices.
  • The phenomenon of 'juice jacking' allows malware to be transferred via compromised chargers.
  • Public charging stations are particularly vulnerable; experts advise against using them.
  • Using a USB data blocker can help protect your device when charging.
  • The FBI has issued warnings about the dangers of public charging stations.
“Never trust a cable that’s not yours.” - Ryan Montgomery

As mobile device users, it is crucial to prioritize security when charging your devices. Opt for personal chargers and data blockers to mitigate risks.

item.title: WhatsApp to Soon Launch Built-In Call Dialer for iPhone Users - Deccan Chronicle
item.description:
WhatsApp to Soon Launch Built-In Call Dialer for iPhone Users

Publication Date: Not provided
Source: 9to5Mac

Tech giant Meta has announced that it will make a call dialer inbuilt into WhatsApp exclusively for iOS users.

The company is exploring ways to enable calling directly from the app without saving contacts. The latest call dialer resembles the iPhone's default dialer, allowing users to dial numbers easily.

  • The new feature allows calls from WhatsApp without saving numbers.
  • It has a user-friendly interface similar to the iPhone's default dialer.
  • This feature is available for users with the latest beta version installed via TestFlight.
  • WhatsApp is also updating the quality of audio and video calls.
“The feature makes it easy for users to make quick calls without saving the number every time.”

The roll-out of this feature marks another step in WhatsApp's efforts to enhance user experience, particularly for those using iOS devices.

item.title: From iPhone 16, Google Pixel 9 to Samsung S24: how have top smartphones evolved in 2024? - The Hindu
item.description:
The Evolution of Top Smartphones in 2024: iPhone 16, Google Pixel 9, and Samsung S24

Date: December 14, 2024 Source: The Hindu

2024 has seen remarkable advancements in flagship smartphones with numerous releases, including the iPhone 16 series and Google Pixel 9 series. This year has been characterized by innovative designs and significant improvements in camera capabilities.

  • The Vivo X100 Pro launched with cutting-edge camera features and MediaTek Dimensity 9300 processor.
  • The OnePlus 12 first to adopt Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 in India, bringing advanced photography options.
  • Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra introduced AI features and a 200 MP main camera.
  • Xiaomi 14 incorporated Leica lenses and a new OS, HyperOS.
  • Motorola Edge 50 Ultra led with gaming features and rapid charging.
  • Google Pixel 9 series introduced native generative AI capabilities.
  • Apple's iPhone 16 Pro Max innovated with AI technology and a larger display.
  • Oppo and Realme launched competitive models targeting premium and budget segments.
“Generative AI became a common factor among the masses and the mobile makers' strategy.”

The evolution of smartphones in 2024 demonstrates unprecedented technological advancements and consumer-centric innovations across major brands, shaping the future landscape of mobile technology.
